definition: A small component found in the human body that plays a crucial role in the transportation of oxygen and nutrients, as well as the removal of waste products. It is commonly referred to in the context of medical discussions and is an essential element for maintaining overall health and bodily functions.

examples.english: Blood cells are components of the blood.

examples.german: Es gibt verschiedene Arten von Blutkörperchen.
examples.english: There are different types of blood cells.
Blood cells transport oxygen in the body.

examples.german: Blutkörperchen spielen eine wichtige Rolle im Immunsystem.
examples.english: Blood cells play an important role in the immune system.

examples.german: Die Anzahl der Blutkörperchen kann im Blutbild bestimmt werden.
examples.english: The number of blood cells can be determined in a blood test.
